tools.name: Bash Development Tools
tools.description: Adds shellcheck, shfmt, bash-language-server, and VS Code extensions for Bash development
tools.abstract: Bash scripting environment with shellcheck linting, shfmt formatting, and language server support.
tools.summary: Complete Bash development setup including shellcheck for static analysis and linting, shfmt for code formatting, and bash-language-server for IDE features like autocomplete and go-to-definition. Includes VS Code extensions for inline warnings and format-on-save.

tools.name: C/C++ Development Tools
tools.description: Installs GCC, Clang, build tools, debuggers, and VS Code extensions for C/C++ development
tools.abstract: C/C++ development environment with GCC, Clang, CMake, debuggers, and VS Code extensions.
tools.summary: Complete C/C++ development setup including GCC and Clang compilers, CMake and Make build systems, GDB and LLDB debuggers, Valgrind for memory analysis, and clang-format/clang-tidy for code quality. Includes VS Code extension pack for C/C++ development.

tools.name: C# Development Tools
tools.description: Installs .NET SDK, ASP.NET Core Runtime, and VS Code extensions for C# development
tools.abstract: C# and .NET development environment with SDK, ASP.NET Core runtime, and VS Code C# Dev Kit.
tools.summary: Complete C# and .NET development setup including the .NET SDK, ASP.NET Core runtime for web development, and the C# Dev Kit for VS Code providing IntelliSense, debugging, and project management. Supports .NET 8.0 and other versions.

tools.name: Fortran Development Tools
tools.description: Installs GNU Fortran compiler (gfortran), build tools, and VS Code extensions for Fortran development
tools.abstract: Fortran development environment with GNU Fortran, LAPACK, BLAS, and VS Code extensions.
tools.summary: Complete Fortran development setup including GNU Fortran compiler (gfortran), LAPACK and BLAS numerical libraries, CMake build system, and VS Code extensions for Modern Fortran with IntelliSense and debugging support.

tools.name: Go Runtime & Development Tools
tools.description: Installs Go runtime, common tools, and VS Code extensions for Go development.
tools.abstract: Go development environment with runtime, language server, debugger, and static analysis tools.
tools.summary: Complete Go development setup including the Go runtime, gopls language server for IDE features, Delve debugger, and staticcheck for code analysis. Includes VS Code extensions for Go development, test running, and Protocol Buffer support.

tools.name: Java Runtime & Development Tools
tools.description: Installs Java JDK, Maven, Gradle, and VS Code extensions for Java development.
tools.abstract: Java development environment with JDK, Maven, Gradle, and comprehensive VS Code extension pack.
tools.summary: Complete Java development setup including the JDK (supports versions 11, 17, 21), Maven and Gradle build tools, and the VS Code Extension Pack for Java with debugging, test running, Maven integration, and dependency management.

tools.name: PHP Laravel Development Tools
tools.description: Installs PHP 8.4, Composer, Laravel installer, and sets up Laravel development environment
tools.abstract: PHP Laravel development environment with PHP 8.4, Composer, Laravel installer, and VS Code extensions.
tools.summary: Complete PHP Laravel development setup including PHP 8.4, Composer package manager, Laravel installer, and comprehensive VS Code extensions for Intelephense, Xdebug, Blade templates, Artisan commands, and namespace resolution.

tools.name: Python Development Tools
tools.description: Adds ipython, pytest-cov, and VS Code extensions for Python development
tools.abstract: Python development environment with ipython, pytest-cov, and python-dotenv for enhanced coding and testing.
tools.summary: Complete Python development setup including ipython for interactive development, pytest-cov for test coverage, and python-dotenv for environment management. Includes VS Code extensions for Python, Pylance, Black formatter, Flake8, and Mypy type checking.

tools.name: Rust Development Tools
tools.description: Installs Rust (latest stable via rustup), cargo, and sets up Rust development environment
tools.abstract: Rust development environment with rustup, cargo tooling, and rust-analyzer for systems programming.
tools.summary: Complete Rust setup via rustup including the Rust compiler, Cargo package manager, cargo-edit for dependency management, cargo-watch for auto-rebuild, and cargo-outdated for dependency updates. Includes rust-analyzer and CodeLLDB debugger VS Code extensions.

tools.name: TypeScript Development Tools
tools.description: Adds TypeScript and development tools (Node.js already in devcontainer)
tools.abstract: TypeScript development environment with compiler, tsx runtime, and essential tooling for modern web development.
tools.summary: Complete TypeScript setup including the TypeScript compiler (tsc), tsx for running TypeScript directly, ts-node for Node.js integration, and @types/node for Node.js type definitions. Includes Prettier and ESLint VS Code extensions.

tools.name: PowerShell
tools.description: Installs PowerShell 7 with PSScriptAnalyzer for script development and linting
tools.abstract: PowerShell 7 with PSScriptAnalyzer for script development and linting.

tools.name: Claude Code
tools.description: Installs Claude Code, Anthropic's terminal-based AI coding assistant with agentic capabilities and LSP integration
tools.abstract: Claude Code - Anthropic's terminal-based AI coding assistant with agentic capabilities.
tools.summary: Claude Code is Anthropic's terminal-based AI coding assistant with agentic capabilities. Features include codebase understanding, multi-file editing, shell command execution, and LSP integration for intelligent code assistance directly in your terminal.

tools.name: API Development Tools
tools.description: Installs Thunder Client REST API client and OpenAPI Editor for API development, testing, and documentation
tools.abstract: API development tools with Thunder Client REST client and OpenAPI/Swagger editor.
tools.summary: VS Code extensions for API development including Thunder Client for REST API testing and the OpenAPI Editor for Swagger/OpenAPI specification editing and validation. Lightweight alternatives to Postman and Swagger UI.

tools.name: Azure Application Development
tools.description: Installs Azure CLI, Functions Core Tools, Azurite, and VS Code extensions for building Azure applications, APIs, Service Bus, and Cosmos DB solutions
tools.abstract: Azure application development with CLI, Functions, Azurite emulator, and VS Code extensions.
tools.summary: Complete Azure development toolkit including Azure CLI, Functions Core Tools v4, Azurite storage emulator, and VS Code extensions for App Service, Functions, Storage, Service Bus, Cosmos DB, and Bicep infrastructure as code.

tools.name: Azure DevOps CLI
tools.description: Installs Azure CLI with azure-devops extension for git PR, merge, and repo management
tools.abstract: Lightweight Azure DevOps CLI for pull requests, merges, and repository management.
tools.summary: Minimal Azure CLI installation with the azure-devops extension. Enables az repos pr create/list/show/update commands for working with Azure DevOps repositories without the heavy extras from tool-azure-dev or tool-azure-ops.

tools.name: Azure Operations & Infrastructure Management
tools.description: Installs Azure CLI, PowerShell with Az/Graph modules, and VS Code extensions for Azure resource management, policy, Bicep IaC, and KQL queries
tools.abstract: Azure operations tools with PowerShell, Az modules, Microsoft Graph, and KQL support.
tools.summary: Azure infrastructure and operations management toolkit including PowerShell 7, Az and Microsoft.Graph modules, Exchange Online Management, Azure CLI, and VS Code extensions for Bicep IaC, KQL queries, and Azure policy management.

tools.name: Okta Identity Management Tools
tools.description: Installs Okta CLI and VS Code extensions for Okta identity and access management
tools.abstract: Okta identity management tools with CLI and VS Code Okta Explorer extension.
tools.summary: Okta identity and access management toolkit including the Okta CLI for managing users, groups, and applications, plus the Okta Explorer VS Code extension for browsing and managing Okta organizations directly from the IDE.

tools.name: Microsoft Power Platform Tools
tools.description: Installs Power Platform CLI (pac - dotnet global tool), Power Platform Tools VS Code extension. Requires .NET SDK and x64 (AMD64) architecture.
tools.abstract: Microsoft Power Platform CLI (pac) for Power Apps, Power Automate, and PCF development.
tools.summary: Microsoft Power Platform development toolkit including the Power Platform CLI (pac) as a .NET global tool for managing Power Apps, Power Automate flows, Dataverse solutions, and Power Platform Component Framework (PCF) controls. Requires .NET SDK.

tools.name: Data & Analytics Tools
tools.description: Installs Python data analysis libraries, Jupyter notebooks, and related VS Code extensions
tools.abstract: Data analytics stack with Jupyter, pandas, numpy, matplotlib, scikit-learn, and dbt.
tools.summary: Complete data analytics toolkit including Jupyter notebooks and JupyterLab, pandas for data manipulation, numpy for numerical computing, matplotlib and seaborn for visualization, scikit-learn for machine learning, and dbt for data transformation.

tools.name: Databricks Development Tools
tools.description: Installs Databricks CLI, Python SDK, Connect, and related tooling for Asset Bundles development
tools.abstract: Databricks development tools with CLI, SDK, Connect, PySpark, and Delta Lake support.
tools.summary: Complete Databricks development environment including Databricks CLI, Python SDK, Databricks Connect for remote development, PySpark and Delta Lake for data processing, and VS Code extensions for Asset Bundles development and workspace integration.

tools.name: Development Utilities
tools.description: Database management (SQLTools), API testing (REST Client), and container management (Docker) for multi-language development
tools.abstract: Development utilities for database management, API testing, and Docker container management.
tools.summary: Language-agnostic development utilities including SQLTools for database management (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, MSSQL, MongoDB), REST Client for HTTP API testing, and Docker extension for container, image, and volume management.

tools.name: Infrastructure as Code Tools
tools.description: Installs Infrastructure as Code and configuration management tools: Ansible, Terraform, and Bicep
tools.abstract: Infrastructure as Code tools with Terraform, Ansible, and Azure Bicep support.
tools.summary: Complete Infrastructure as Code toolkit including Terraform for multi-cloud provisioning, Ansible for configuration management and automation, ansible-lint for playbook validation, and Azure Bicep for ARM template development with VS Code extensions.

tools.name: Kubernetes Development Tools
tools.description: Installs kubectl, k9s, helm and sets up .devcontainer.secrets folder for kubeconfig
tools.abstract: Kubernetes development tools with kubectl, k9s terminal UI, and Helm package manager.
tools.summary: Kubernetes development toolkit including kubectl CLI for cluster management, k9s terminal UI for interactive cluster exploration, Helm for package management, and VS Code Kubernetes extension. Sets up .devcontainer.secrets for secure kubeconfig storage.
